summary:
Ewis WovenFence
by SparrowPrince and ewi65
*********************
This mod edits the meshes and adds new textures for the woven fences found in and around settlements.
The vanilla mesh has been edited with better transparency blending and textures are generated from detailed 3D models and combined for a high-quality effect.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/01logoi6f2rbhl1j.jpg[/img][/url]
[center][size=3][color=#ff7700]*********************[/color]
[color=#00ffff]Ewis WovenFence[/color]
[color=#ffff00]by SparrowPrince and ewi65[/color]
[color=#ff7700]*********************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]This mod edits the meshes and adds new textures for the woven fences found in and around settlements. The vanilla mesh has been edited with better transparency blending and textures are generated from detailed 3D models and combined for a high-quality effect.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-No more shimmer on distance.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-lore friendly
-performance friendly: both meshes are only 36 kb.[/color]
[color=#ff7700]********************[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Includes:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-High-quality 2k/1k colour and uncompressed normalmaps (with pre-rendered ambient occlusion).[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-Edited vanilla meshes with better transparency blending to reduce jaggies while maintaining performance.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-Re-mapped mesh texture positions so both fence meshes have unique positioning and layout for the texture.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]-Better blending with the 3D weave on top of the fences. The 3D weave was copied in a unique way and re-made in 2D for the best quality/performance ratio.[/color]
[color=#ff7700]*******************[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Compatibility:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]SMIM will get overwritten along with any other mod that touches the fence meshes. Other textures for the weave are not compatible and won't be used by default. The 3D parts of the mesh (posts) are compatible with every texture mod.[/color]
[color=#ff7700]*******************[/color]
[color=#ff0000]Install:[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Using your favorite Mod Manager or extract to your Skyrim Main Folder.[/color]
[color=#ffff00]******************[/color]
[color=#ffff00]Credits:
SparrowPrince for the edited Meshes and the original Textures.[/color]
[/size][color=#ff7700][size=3]******************[/size]
[/color][url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/wf00resizekuaw9rh7el.jpg[/img][/url][/center][url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/wf01resizeilpdf2vywk.jpg[/img]
[/url][url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/wf04resizebdr8ytp9lv.jpg[/img][/url]
author: SparrowPrince and ewi65
